template.name: Huawei Chassis SWI Template
template.description: The CX320 supports the Zabbix template. The CX621 supports the Zabbix template.

item.name: hwBMAForwardFailed
item.description: iBMA failed to establish forward mapping table (arg1). arg1 indicates Cause of the alarm. Example: (1:Failed to bind port 1. 2:Failed to bind port 1 and the port(s) is/are occupied.)

item.name: hwBMCEEPSelfCheckFailure
item.description: iBMC EEPROM self-check failed.

item.name: hwBMCEventCleared
item.description: iBMC event records are cleared.

item.name: hwBMCEventSpaceExceedThreshold
item.description: iBMC event record has reached 90% space capacity.

item.name: hwBMCMMHeartBeatFault
item.description: Abnormal heartbeat signal between the iBMC and management module.

item.name: hwBMCNTPSynchronizeFailed
item.description: iBMC failed to synchronize time with the NTP server.

item.name: hwBMCOPLogSpaceExceedThreshold
item.description: iBMC operation log has reached 90% space capacity.

item.name: hwBMCResetandStarted
item.description: iBMC is reset and started.

item.name: hwBMCRestartedAfterPowerRestored
item.description: iBMC is restarted after AC power supply is restored.

item.name: hwBMCSecureLogSpaceExceedThreshold
item.description: iBMC security log has reached 90% space capacity.

item.name: hwBMCTimeHopping
item.description: iBMC time is stepped by more than arg1 minutes. arg1 indicates the time stepped.

item.name: hwBMCVersionChanged
item.description: arg1 changed. arg1 indicates the SDR or FR information and iBMC version.

item.name: hwChassisAccessInletTempFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain data of the air inlet temperature.

item.name: hwChassisAccessOutletTempFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain data of the air outlet arg1 temperature. arg1 indicates serial number of the outlet.

item.name: hwChassisInletOverTempCritical
item.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold.

item.name: hwChassisInletOverTempMajor
item.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold.

item.name: hwChassisInletOverTempMinor
item.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneBeingPoweredOn
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is being powered on.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneInProgressPoweredOff
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is being powered off.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneLSWAccessTempFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain data of the LSW temperature for fabric plane.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneLSWOverTempMajor
item.description: Switch module Fabric plane LSW chip temperature arg1(arg2 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg3 degrees C). arg1 indicates temperature detection point. arg2 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneNotInstalled
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is not installed.

item.name: hwFabricPlanePoweredOn
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is powered on.

item.name: hwFabricPlanePowerOff
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is installed but powered off.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneReqPoweredOff
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module requests power-off.

item.name: hwFabricPlaneReqPowerOn
item.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module requests power-on.

item.name: hwMainboard3V3LowerVoltage
item.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 3.3 V detection point is lower than the undervoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboard3V3OverVoltage
item.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 3.3 V detection point exceeds the overvoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboard12VLowerVoltage
item.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 12 V detection point [arg3] is lower than the undervoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg4). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg4 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboard12VOverVoltage
item.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 12 V detection point arg3 exceeds the overvoltage threshold (arg2 V) arg4. arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg4 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardAccess3V3Failure
item.description: Failed to obtain the voltage at 3.3 V detection point on the mainboard (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardAccess12VFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain the voltage at 12 V detection point [arg1] on the mainboard (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg2 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardAccessBoardIDFailure
item.description: The board ID cannot be obtained or is incorrect (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardAccessFRULableFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain electronic label data of mainboard (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardAccessSlotFailure
item.description: The board slot number cannot be obtained or is incorrect (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardBeingPowerOff
item.description: The mainboard is being powered off.

item.name: hwMainboardBeingPowerOn
item.description: The mainboard is being powered on.

item.name: hwMainboardClockSignalLost
item.description: Mainboard arg1 clock arg2 signals lost (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates type of the mainboard clock. For example, 100MHz or 156.25MHz. arg2 indicates mainboard clock number. arg3 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardCPLDSelfTestFailure
item.description: Abnormal mainboard CPLD self-check result (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardIncorrectHWAddr
item.description: Incorrect hardware address (arg1 address) of the board (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates hardware address of the mainboard. arg2 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardMOSAccessVoltageFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain the MOS [arg1] FET voltage drop of the soft-start circuit (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the monitoring point of the soft-start circuit. arg2 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardMOSOverTemp
item.description: Soft-start circuit MOS FET temperature is too high at detection point arg1 (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the MOSFET temperature detection point. arg2 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardMOSOverVoltageCritical
item.description: The MOS FET voltage drop (arg1 V) of the soft-start circuit on the mainboard exceeds the threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates Alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardMOSOverVoltageMajor
item.description: The MOS FET voltage drop (arg1 V) of the soft-start circuit on the mainboard exceeds the threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates Alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardNotPowerOn
item.description: The mainboard is installed but not powered on.

item.name: hwMainboardNotProperlyInstalled
item.description: The board is not properly installed (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardPoweredOn
item.description: The mainboard is powered on.

item.name: hwMainboardReqPowerOff
item.description: The mainboard requests power-off.

item.name: hwMainboardReqPowerOn
item.description: The mainboard requests power-on.

item.name: hwMainboardSoftStartFault
item.description: Soft-start circuit critical fault (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwMainboardSoftStartPGAbnormal
item.description: Soft-start circuit power supply abnormal at detection point arg1 (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the monitoring point of the soft-start circuit. arg2 indicates BOM code.

item.name: hwSystemAccessPowerFailure
item.description: Failed to obtain data of the total system power.

trigger.name: hwBMAForwardFailed minor
trigger.description: iBMA failed to establish forward mapping table (arg1). arg1 indicates Cause of the alarm. Example: (1:Failed to bind port 1. 2:Failed to bind port 1 and the port(s) is/are occupied.) This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCEEPSelfCheckFailure major
trigger.description: iBMC EEPROM self-check failed. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCEventCleared ok
trigger.description: iBMC event records are cleared. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCEventSpaceExceedThreshold ok
trigger.description: iBMC event record has reached 90% space capacity. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCMMHeartBeatFault major
trigger.description: Abnormal heartbeat signal between the iBMC and management module. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCNTPSynchronizeFailed ok
trigger.description: iBMC failed to synchronize time with the NTP server. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCOPLogSpaceExceedThreshold ok
trigger.description: iBMC operation log has reached 90% space capacity. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCResetandStarted ok
trigger.description: iBMC is reset and started. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCRestartedAfterPowerRestored ok
trigger.description: iBMC is restarted after AC power supply is restored. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCSecureLogSpaceExceedThreshold ok
trigger.description: iBMC security log has reached 90% space capacity. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCTimeHopping ok
trigger.description: iBMC time is stepped by more than arg1 minutes. arg1 indicates the time stepped. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwBMCVersionChanged ok
trigger.description: arg1 changed. arg1 indicates the SDR or FR information and iBMC version. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwChassisAccessInletTempFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain data of the air inlet temperature. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwChassisAccessOutletTempFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain data of the air outlet arg1 temperature. arg1 indicates serial number of the outlet. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwChassisInletOverTempCritical critical
trigger.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwChassisInletOverTempMajor major
trigger.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwChassisInletOverTempMinor minor
trigger.description: The air inlet temperature (arg1 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg2 degrees C). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneBeingPoweredOn ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is being powered on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneInProgressPoweredOff ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is being powered off. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneLSWAccessTempFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain data of the LSW temperature for fabric plane. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneLSWOverTempMajor major
trigger.description: Switch module Fabric plane LSW chip temperature arg1(arg2 degrees C) exceeds the overtemperature threshold (arg3 degrees C). arg1 indicates temperature detection point. arg2 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneNotInstalled ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is not installed. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlanePoweredOn ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is powered on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlanePowerOff ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module is installed but powered off. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneReqPoweredOff ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module requests power-off. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwFabricPlaneReqPowerOn ok
trigger.description: The Fabric plane of the switch module requests power-on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboard3V3LowerVoltage major
trigger.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 3.3 V detection point is lower than the undervoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboard3V3OverVoltage major
trigger.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 3.3 V detection point exceeds the overvoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboard12VLowerVoltage major
trigger.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 12 V detection point [arg3] is lower than the undervoltage threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg4). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg4 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboard12VOverVoltage major
trigger.description: Mainboard voltage (arg1 V) at 12 V detection point arg3 exceeds the overvoltage threshold (arg2 V) arg4. arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates alarm threshold. arg3 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg4 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardAccess3V3Failure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain the voltage at 3.3 V detection point on the mainboard (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardAccess12VFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain the voltage at 12 V detection point [arg1] on the mainboard (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates 12 V detection point. For example, 1, 2, 3, or 4. arg2 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardAccessBoardIDFailure major
trigger.description: The board ID cannot be obtained or is incorrect (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardAccessFRULableFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain electronic label data of mainboard (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardAccessSlotFailure major
trigger.description: The board slot number cannot be obtained or is incorrect (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardBeingPowerOff ok
trigger.description: The mainboard is being powered off. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardBeingPowerOn ok
trigger.description: The mainboard is being powered on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardClockSignalLost major
trigger.description: Mainboard arg1 clock arg2 signals lost (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates type of the mainboard clock. For example, 100MHz or 156.25MHz. arg2 indicates mainboard clock number. arg3 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardCPLDSelfTestFailure major
trigger.description: Abnormal mainboard CPLD self-check result (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardIncorrectHWAddr major
trigger.description: Incorrect hardware address (arg1 address) of the board (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates hardware address of the mainboard. arg2 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardMOSAccessVoltageFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain the MOS [arg1] FET voltage drop of the soft-start circuit (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the monitoring point of the soft-start circuit. arg2 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardMOSOverTemp minor
trigger.description: Soft-start circuit MOS FET temperature is too high at detection point arg1 (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the MOSFET temperature detection point. arg2 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardMOSOverVoltageCritical critical
trigger.description: The MOS FET voltage drop (arg1 V) of the soft-start circuit on the mainboard exceeds the threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates Alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardMOSOverVoltageMajor major
trigger.description: The MOS FET voltage drop (arg1 V) of the soft-start circuit on the mainboard exceeds the threshold (arg2 V) (BN: arg3). arg1 indicates current reading of the sensor. arg2 indicates Alarm threshold. arg3 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardNotPowerOn ok
trigger.description: The mainboard is installed but not powered on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardNotProperlyInstalled major
trigger.description: The board is not properly installed (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardPoweredOn ok
trigger.description: The mainboard is powered on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardReqPowerOff ok
trigger.description: The mainboard requests power-off. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardReqPowerOn ok
trigger.description: The mainboard requests power-on. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardSoftStartFault major
trigger.description: Soft-start circuit critical fault (BN: arg1). arg1 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwMainboardSoftStartPGAbnormal minor
trigger.description: Soft-start circuit power supply abnormal at detection point arg1 (BN: arg2). arg1 indicates number of the monitoring point of the soft-start circuit. arg2 indicates BOM code. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)

trigger.name: hwSystemAccessPowerFailure minor
trigger.description: Failed to obtain data of the total system power. This value's hwTrapSeverity will be one of the following: (1-ok, 2-minor, 3-major, 4-critical)
